integration_patterns: FHIR APIs for health data exchange

evidence.claim: Swift Medical Solutions operates on AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for healthcare data.
Integration with EHR systems using HL7 and FHIR standards is a core feature.
Support for industry-standard X12 transaction sets for claims and billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or API automation related to clearinghouse functions.
